TEXT.S: Dragan Bender nalecuhan i ÄŒapljina, Bosnia and Herzegovina, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dragan Bender i 2016 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 4, namapili' tu nu Phoenix Suns putiput. 11 bulad 17 demiad, 1997 a mihca, Dragan Bender, miunduay.
